definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: I strongly believe that Japanese high school girls are the sexiest female living creature in this world.
sentences.chinese: 我深信日本女子高生是世上最性感的雌性生物。

sentences.english: These characteristics are found, though in a lesser degree, in the bitch.
sentences.chinese: 这些特征在雌性身上也有，只是程度略轻一些。

sentences.english: The researchers studied the behaviour of female brown capuchin monkeys, which have all the necessary ingredients to capture the public imagination.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员对两只棕色的雌性卷尾猴的行为进行了研究。

sentences.english: The researchers studied the behaviour of female brown capuchin monkeys.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员研究了雌性僧帽猴的行为举动。

sentences.english: They are more reproductively successful than unpaired females.
sentences.chinese: 和未配对的雌性相比，她们更能成功繁衍后代。

sentences.english: Oocytes of female coelom were counted.
sentences.chinese: 计数雌性个体体腔卵细胞。

sentences.english: There are female hormones that target this fat at that time.
sentences.chinese: 这时雌性激素会作用于这些脂肪。

sentences.english: The female was spiraling in the air with the corpse of the male butterfly attached.
sentences.chinese: 原来是雌性背着雄性的尸体在空中盘旋。

sentences.english: I had the unique experience of working with a killer whale orphan.
sentences.chinese: 我有过跟一头雌性的孤儿虎鲸一起工作的特别经验。

sentences.english: The female archesporium differentiates from the single cell under the epidermis of nucellus.
sentences.chinese: 雌性孢原处于珠心表皮之下，为单细胞。

sentences.english: The males in the herd protect the females and the young .
sentences.chinese: 兽群中的雄性动物保护雌性动物和幼仔。

sentences.english: Females are significantly larger than males.
sentences.chinese: 雌性绿森蚺要较雄性更大一些。

sentences.english: The female of the  species is very  aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 这个物种中雌性是非常好斗的。

sentences.english: The researchers studied the behaviour of female brown capuchin monkeys. They look cute.
sentences.chinese: 研究者们对雌性棕色卷尾猴的行为进行了研究。

sentences.english: The female of the species is more deadly than the male.
sentences.chinese: 这个物种的雌性比雄性更能致人死命。

definition: the young (unborn or newborn) of an animal/larva
population (of a species)/community (of animals or plants)
the breeding season (zool.)/oestrus (period of sexual receptivity of female mammals)
mammals/also written 哺乳動物|哺乳动物
